entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is trying to find the Horcrux.

entities.name: rowena ravenclaw
entities.description: A founder of Hogwarts and a creator of magical objects, mentioned as having a marble bust at Xenophilius's house.

entities.name: xenophilius
entities.description: The owner of the house where Rowena Ravenclaw's marble bust is located.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: A former student at Hogwarts and a dark wizard, who created the Horcrux.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as having penetrated the deepest mysteries of the castle.

relationships.description: Harry is reminded of Rowena Ravenclaw when he sees the marble bust at Xenophilius's house.
Tom Riddle created the Horcrux, which Harry is trying to find.
Dumbledore has penetrated the deepest mysteries of Hogwarts Castle, which Harry is also trying to do.
Harry is targeting the Horcrux, which he knows is located in a specific place.
